title: The original and growth of the Spanish monarchy united with the House of Austria extracted from those chronicles, annals, registers, and genealogies that yeild [sic] any faithful representation how the houses of Castile, Aragon and Burgundy became knit and combin'd by Thomas Philipot ...
author: Philipot, Thomas, d. 1682.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by W.G. for R. Taylor ...,
